name: Princess Peach
text: I've been several times. They're lunch buffet is cheap and easy. I've never had bad service or bad food. Sometimes it's crazy busy for the lunch buffet and hard to find a seat but usually not an issue. The manager is very nice and friendly.

name: Thomas McKay
text:
The pizza is better than average!
Good bargain on there lunch buffet
Willing to accommodate
Happy customer

name: Sheila Urlaub
text: Love them. Good food and they support the local community. Good specials, never had a problem with the quality or cleanliness

name: David Kinyon
text: We discovered this place when we moved into our house in Wildomar.  The best pizza for delivery we have had.  We haven't eaten in the resteraunt, but they get every order right, and it is always hot when we get it. …More

name: Michael Sanchez
text: Today Superbowl Sunday I ordered two Pizza's which took a while to prepare but was well worth the wait... Good job girls!

name: Eliza Luna
text: Found dead fly in our salad plate. The new girl entered our order wrong and then called us liars when we let her know we didn't order veggie pizza! Owner Chris Hulse refuses to refund us for our horrendous experience at her 'so called pizza …More

name: jeff gnann
text: Definitely not the best pizza factory I've been to! I love pizza factory pizza but this place seems to skimp on toppings and when ive present them with a coupon that didnt apply to this location they wouldnt work out any deal and were fine …More

name: KamsWar NPeace
text: Great pizza but at this location they dont have as much of a location as the menifee one. The menifee one has pasta more salad stuff more pizza selection this one has 2 pizzas and they ask what you want but give you 2 slices menifee one …More
